sandbox.title: Design System Sandbox
sandbox.description: Experiment with UI components and design tokens

cards.title: Card Title
cards.description: This is a card with custom theme colors. It should adapt to light and dark modes.
cards.cardDescription: Notice how the background, text, and border colors change with the theme.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your email below to login to your account

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

emailSent.title: Check Your Email
emailSent.description: If the email address exists in our system, you will receive a password reset link shortly.

success.title: Password Reset Successfully
success.description: Your password has been reset. You can now log in with your new password.

error.title: Invalid Reset Link
error.description: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
error.generic: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

checkEmail.title: Check Your Email
checkEmail.description: We've sent you a confirmation email with a link to activate your account.
checkEmail.instructions: Click the link in the email to complete your registration.

error.title: Authentication Error
error.description: There was a problem with your authentication.

confirmation.title: Confirm Your Email
confirmation.description: We've sent a confirmation email to:
confirmation.successDescription: Your email has been successfully confirmed.
confirmation.successMessage: Email confirmed successfully! You can now log in.
confirmation.errorMessage: Failed to confirm email. Please check your token and try again.
confirmation.resendErrorMessage: Failed to resend confirmation email. Please try again.
confirmation.resendSuccessMessage: We've sent you a new confirmation email. Please check your inbox.
confirmation.resendDescription: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a new confirmation link.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.description: Create an account to get started.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.passwordFormat: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Manage your project portfolio
projects.loadErrorDescription: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
projects.emptyStateDescription: Create your first project to get started.
